pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with President of Bulgaria Rumen Radev | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with the President of Bulgaria, Rumen Radev in advance of the NATO Leaders Meeting.

Prime Minister Trudeau and President Radev discussed the crucial role NATO plays in defence of trans-Atlantic security and affirmed a shared and unwavering commitment to the Alliance. Prime Minister Trudeau expressed Canadaâ€™s appreciation for the essential assistance Bulgarian authorities provided following the tragic accidental death of Canadian Armed Forces member Bombardier Patrick Labrie in a training accident in Bulgaria in June.

The Prime Minister and the President highlighted the valuable people-to-people ties between Canada and Bulgaria and committed to strengthening bilateral relations.
